item.title: GitHub Page Setup
item.description: Install Git and Hugo On Arch Linux sudo pacman -S git hugo Hugo new site quickstart and test Create a new site in the specified directory hugo new site <dir> cd <dir> Create Git repository git init Add a theme (Hugo Themes) Find the theme’s repository using the Download link on the theme’s page git submodule add <theme repository> themes/<theme> echo "theme = '<theme>'" >> config.
